NAME: invites
DESCRIPTION: Permet de voir vos invitations ou celles d'un ami.
IS_BOT: Impossible de voir les invitations d'un bot.
BLACKLISTED: You or the mentionned user is blacklisted on this server, please contact a Moderator / Administrator.

OPTIONS_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: The member to check the invites of.
